entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is excited about the Triwizard Tournament. He mentions that he doesn't want to spoil it for Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: The Triwizard Tournament is an event where champions from different schools compete against each other. Hagrid seems excited about it and mentions that the champions will have their work cut out.

relationships.description: Hagrid is excited about the Triwizard Tournament, as mentioned in the text: 'You wait... Yer going ter see some stuff yeh've never seen before.'
